name: info_gps_field
label: First you will record GPS coordinates for the OUTER corners of each treatment, Cover and Bare, noted in black 'X's in the diagram. Note: it does NOT matter which corner you start in.

name: info_center_gps_field
label: Then you will record GPS coordinate of the center of the biomass sampling area (in blue), noted by the yellow X's in the diagram

name: code
label: What is the 3 letter site Code?
hint: These 3 letter codes were selected for you when you enrolled a farm

name: end
label: This is the end of the GPS form. You will collect GPS points when you install soil moisture sensors, the the 'psa_water_sensor_install' form

name: comments
label: If you have any issues to report, or comments include them here
